page.title: 15VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The Women's Institute meets once a month in the Village Hall.It was established in 1937 and now has third generation members.They organise various events in the village including the May Queen Celebrations and help with the Harvest Supper and the Annual Garden Party for the Church Funds.The Drama Club also meets in the hall,it puts on a pantomime at Christmas and a Summer Entertainment. Last year this took the form of a Street Fayre. The Over Sixties Club meets once a week and the Whist Club once a fortnight. The village football club plays weekly during the season at the Recreation Ground. The Mobile Library comes round once a fortnight.
